section.p: is OpenStack technology coupled with HPE Linux for HPE Helion

HPE Linux for HPE Helion is built on-top of Debian stable with a custom kernel and used throughout HPE for Cloud and Enterprise. The Host OS and Services have been hardened:
Shipped with an optimized footprint â€“ ship only Debian packages that Helion OpenStack requires
Monitor compute nodes and enforce access control policies using AppArmor profiles
Protect access to API endpoints using TLS
Improve security by randomizing default passwords
These changes provide a reduced attack surface, protect against threats and breaches, and proactively mitigates risk.
